oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial photograph of North Nashville, circa 1968
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aerial photograph of North Nashville in Buena Vista neighborhood, looking southwest, circa 1968, taken by Metro Photographer, William M. King. The photograph shows a partially wooded residential area, although many lots appear to be vacant. Buchanan Street runs along the left hand side of the image; Nassau Street and 9th Avenue North are also marked on the photograph. The large structure with a smokestack on the corner of Buchanan Street and 9th Avenue North, in the upper left of the photo is Jones School. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.

Planning maps for the route of Interstate 265 show it crossing Nassau Street at the intersection with Buchanan. This portion of the interstate was built between 1968 and 1971. In 2000, Interstate 265 ceased to exist, and was redesignated as part of Interstate 65.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Jones School (Nashville, Tenn.);
